fullText: Nearly 45 years ago, I saw a performance of Stephen Sondheim and George Furth’s musical “Company.” The show had just opened and the theatergoers at my particular performance were more than a little confused and exasperated at this tendency the characters had for repeatedly showing up at the same birthday party.
textIssues: Show title not found in text
rejectionReasoning: claude: This appears to be the opening of a personal anecdote about seeing Company 45 years ago, not a review of a current Broadway production; openai: The text is a personal anecdote about a past performance of 'Company' and does not provide any evaluation or review of the current Broadway production.; gemini: This is the start of a review, but it only describes seeing a previous production of the show. There is no evaluation of the current production.; kimi: The text explicitly describes a performance of 'Company' from 'nearly 45 years ago' when the show 'had just opened' (referring to the original 1970 production), not a current Broadway revival. It contains no evaluation of any current production.
